name: Fujiori
description:
It's been centuries since Opako Shimura froze on the top of mt. Fuji! You gotta help him to climb down and fulfill an old promise.

This game was made in Unreal Engine for EpicMegaJam2020 by Horny Panda Studios.

Game Artists:

  • Noelia Dorado: https://noeluxii.itch.io

Game Designers:

  • Alberto Calderón: https://albimangaka.itch.io
  • Guillermo Grijalvo: https://demoniacuss.itch.io

Game Programmers:

  • Javier Morel: https://javimorel.itch.io
  • Diego Romero: https://majestic511.itch.io
